title: Scaling dirty handoff automation for many agents
summary: Dirty-handshake receipts work for a handful of codex seats but will exhaust dashboards and humans if agents scale arbitrarily.
signals: coord_dashboard dirty handoff alerts, manual manifest swaps, multi-commit release
actions: Prototype auto-resolution when git status clears; shard coordination receipts; add push-ready guard that fails if unrelated plan receipts missing.
notes: Need queue-driven cleanup bot to reconcile receipts, auto-assign dirty contexts, and enforce manifest activation per agent to avoid cross-seat drift.
